hooks.command: jq -r '.message' | xargs -I {} terminal-notifier -message "{}" -title "Claude Hook" -group "$(pwd):hook" -execute "bash -c 'if pgrep -x ghostty >/dev/null; then open -a Ghostty; elif [ -n \"$WEZTERM_PANE\" ]; then /opt/homebrew/bin/wezterm cli activate-pane --pane-id $WEZTERM_PANE; fi'" -activate com.mitchellh.ghostty
